word:
All our works are to be wrought in Christ. By becoming partakers of His nature, His followers are to work His works. The ministry of Christ for men was the interpretation of His great commission to the disciples, "Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature." [John 3:31-35, quoted.]--Manuscript 1, 1908. 

White Estate Washington, D. C. November, 1984. Entire Manuscript.
